name: Standard Product ERP Module (Executive Dashboard)
desc: Developed end-to-end application including design, database, backend logic, and dashboards. Handled requirement analysis, development, deployment, and optimization using Oracle APEX, SQL, PL/SQL.

name: Gym Management System
desc: Developed a Gym Management system in Oracle APEX with modules for member registration, fees tracking & collection, attendance, and reporting. Technologies A: Oracle APEX, SQL, PL/SQL.

name: All ERP Modules (Finance, Sales, CRM)
desc: Designed and developed ERP solutions across modules. Built interactive dashboards with KPIs, real-time analytics, and automated refresh using Oracle SQL, Power BI, DAX.
